segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've just heard an announcement that my flight has been delayed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it's true . It has been delayed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you please tell me why ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . The delay is due to heavy rain .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will the delay be ? Do you have any further information about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry , we don't know the extent of the delay at present . But according to the latest weather forecast , there will be a change in weather soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have to wait . Well , is it possible for the rain to stop before noon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to say . Weather is so changeable in the summer . Please listen to the latest announcement about your flight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I will . Thanks a lot . Bye !
segments.speaker: S1
